price: 120. Wuxuu u ballan qaadaa oo geliyaa hiddidiillooyin been ah, mana u ballan qaado shaydaan waxaan dhagar ahayn.
arabic: يَعِدُهُمۡ وَيُمَنِّيهِمۡۖ وَمَا يَعِدُهُمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ إِلَّا غُرُورًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yaʿiduhum wayumannīhim wamā yaʿiduhumu al-shayṭānu illā ghurūran
